summary: A test suite that validates the decoder‑only conditional generation functionality of the BLIP‑2 model, checking forward signatures, hidden state outputs, input embeddings, configuration loading, common model attributes, pretrained loading, gradient retention, and fast initialization save/load behavior.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness and robustness of the BLIP‑2 decoder‑only generation component for reliable use in multimodal applications such as image captioning or visual‑language generation.
